thread.title: 11 Best National Hot Dog Day Freebies and Deals
thread.title_full: 11 Best National Hot Dog Day Freebies and Deals

author: Elyssa Kirkham
title: 11 Best National Hot Dog Day Freebies and Deals
text:
By Elyssa Kirkham July 23, 2015 
July 23 is National Hot Dog Day, a time to indulge in this all-American meat snack. Whether you like your hot dog loaded up with ketchup and mustard, deep-fried, or smothered in chili, you can find deals for cheap or free hot dogs on National Hot Dog Day. 
Read: 31 Fun, Free Things to Do This Summer 11 Places for Cheap or Free Hot Dogs on National Hot Dog Day 
Many restaurants are offering customers hot dog deals to celebrate the unofficial July 23 holiday. To help you find a great deal, GOBankingRates rounds up National Hot Dog Day freebies and deals. Listed below are the places you can get a free hot dog or save money on one on Thursday. 7-Eleven: The convenience store is lowering its prices on Quarter-Pound Big Bite all-beef hot dogs to $1 on July 23. The hot dogs are available at participating locations. EVOS: Through National Hot Dog Day, EVOS is offering a buy-one-get-one-free deal on hot dogs. Fuddruckers: At Austin, Texas, locations this coupon from Offers.com can get you a Black Angus Chili Cheese Hot Dog with fries and a bottomless coke for just $7. Tax and gratuity not included. Hop Dog: On July 23 from 3 p.m. to 7 p.m., this Portland, Ore., restaurant is offering free samples of its selection of hot dogs. Jack’s: Henderson, Tenn., foodies can get two chili cheese dogs and fries for $3.79 on National Hot Dog Day. Kangaroo Express: Customers can get $0.50 Ball Park hot dogs from 4 p.m. to 8 p.m. at Kangaroo Express. You can get a hot dog and a Polar Pop Cup for $1.19. If you have a valid military ID, you get one free hot dog. This offer is only available at participating locations. Limit four hot dogs per customer. Nathan’s Famous: If you buy one hot dog and use this coupon at a participating Nathan’s Famous restaurant, you get your second hot dog for just $0.05 through July 31. Philly Pretzel Factory: The first 300 customers at a Philly Pretzel Factory location will get a free pretzel hot dog on Thursday. Pilot and Flying J: At participating Pilot and Flying J locations, this coupon will get you a free hot dog through midnight, July 23. RaceTrac: Get a free Nathan’s Famous hot dog at participating RaceTrac locations with this coupon , valid through July 31. Sonic: All day on July 23, Sonic is offering $1 hot dogs. Sonic’s foot-long hot dogs are excluded. Tax is not included in this offer. 
Share This Article
